dXSfqzRW43I.title: Build Any Website With ChatGPT, Here’s How
dXSfqzRW43I.author: David Ondrej
dXSfqzRW43I.description:
Click here for the Custom Instructions - https://value.davidondrej.com/video02

If you're serious about AI, join my exclusive community: https://www.skool.com/new-society

Please Subscribe.

Stuff I can't post on YouTube - https://x.com/DavidOndrej1

With ChatGPT and VS Code you can build literally any website
Even if you know nothing about programming or HTML
To a lot of people, building a website from scratch seems like an impossible task
But if you simply follow what I’m doing you will have a working website
AND you will learn how to use AI tools like ChatGPT
